price: Ali šejtan ga poče nagovarati i govoriti: “O Ademe, hoćeš li da ti pokažem drvo besmrtnosti i carstvo koje neće nestati?”
arabic: فَوَسۡوَسَ إِلَيۡهِ ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنُ قَالَ يَٰٓـَٔادَمُ هَلۡ أَدُلُّكَ عَلَىٰ شَجَرَةِ ٱلۡخُلۡدِ وَمُلۡكٖ لَّا يَبۡلَىٰ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: fawaswasa ilayhi al-shayṭānu qāla yāādamu hal adulluka ʿalā shajarati al-khul'di wamul'kin lā yablā
